research_interests.summary: My research interests span theoretical, computational, and observational aspects of Black holes and supermassive compact objects. [cite: 10]

Relativistic orbits and precession of S-stars [cite: 11]
Relativistic time delays and pulsar timings [cite: 11]
Energy extraction from ultra-strong gravity regions [cite: 11]
Plasma astrophysics and magnetized accretion flows [cite: 11]
